title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync message
description: The JarExporter functionality is causing an out of sync message when overwriting the exported jar file for a directory (project) that contains the same exported jar file.
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar file in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when attempting to overwrite the exported jar file for the second time.
EB: The JarExporter should not display an out of sync message when overwriting the exported jar file for a directory (project) that contains the same exported jar file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Export a directory (project).
2. Place the exported jar file in the same directory (project).
3. Attempt to overwrite the exported jar file for the second time.
